description: Justicia: named for James Justice; americana: of the Americas
Ruellia: named for Jean Ruel- 16th century French botanist; caroliniensis: of or from Carolina (U.S.)
Acorus: plant with an aromatic rhizome; americanus: of the Americas
Sambucus: named for the sambuca- a stringed instrument made from the elder wood; canadensis: of or from Canada and North America
Viburnum: Latin name for the wayfaring tree; acerifolium: leaves like a maple tree
